a1184d59-9d68-4b34-86af-5cd8aba1e81a.name: Elixir Resistance (@Elixir@)
a1184d59-9d68-4b34-86af-5cd8aba1e81a.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

e0c045c6-fccd-4db5-b1af-e5d8fe318ac0.name: Magical Weapon Bond (@Specific Weapon Type@)
e0c045c6-fccd-4db5-b1af-e5d8fe318ac0.notes: +1 to effective combat skill with attuned weapon

43493c42-75d0-489c-a764-b011143e3408.name: Spell Bond (@Spell@)
43493c42-75d0-489c-a764-b011143e3408.notes: +1 to cast a spell, but easier to detect

10695fe5-9ba4-4c9f-b464-61c52b6374e4.name: Staff Bond (@Specific Staff@)
10695fe5-9ba4-4c9f-b464-61c52b6374e4.notes: When readied, may ignore -1 of current total penalty for spells 'on', if at least one was cast through bonded item

295d6708-c412-4909-aee3-6dd2b69716bb.name: Wizardly Dabbler
295d6708-c412-4909-aee3-6dd2b69716bb.notes: Able to cast up to 8 Hard Spells without learning them

d5ba5ee7-a4b2-4bbd-b6c0-47c63abf9619.name: Wizardly Garb
d5ba5ee7-a4b2-4bbd-b6c0-47c63abf9619.notes: Nonmagical ritual trappings aren't affected by damage or size changes
